system.description: Combat training focused on arena fighting, disarming, and enduring harsh battles.

levelDescriptions.1: 2 attacks per melee round, disarm on a roll of 19 or 20, +2 to roll with punch/fall/impact.
levelDescriptions.2: +3 to pull punch, +1 to strike and parry.
levelDescriptions.4: +1 attack per melee round, +2 to save vs Horror Factor.
levelDescriptions.5: +1 to strike, disarm on a roll of 18-20.
levelDescriptions.6: +1 to parry and dodge, entangle, body flip (1D6 damage).
levelDescriptions.7: +1 attack per melee round, +2 to damage.
levelDescriptions.8: Stun on an unmodified roll of 18, 19, or 20.
levelDescriptions.9: +2 to pull punch, +2 to roll with punch/impact.
levelDescriptions.11: +1 to parry, +2 to dodge, +2 to save vs Horror Factor.
levelDescriptions.14: +2 to pull punch, disarm on a roll of 17-20.
levelDescriptions.15: Critical strike (triple damage) or knockout from behind.
